website_summaries.verdict: This powerhouse of a printer can copy, scan, fax, and print in color, making it a reliable option for small businesses.
pros: Designed with efficiency in mind, this capable printer offers a variety of functions in a reasonably sized package
The duplex printing option works quickly and is easy to use
cons: This is a fairly expensive option that is best suited for those with business printing needs

website_summaries.verdict: With a compact footprint, near-flawless printing, and ease of use, this is a top-choice all-in-one color printer.
pros: A perfect fit for home offices thanks to its all-in-one capabilities and relatively small footprint
Prints both black-and-white and color pages quickly, at 28 ppm
cons: Scanner software is a bit kludgy, and networking the printer may take some troubleshooting

customer_reviews.title: VERY well designed printer !
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! I have always liked HP printers. They really have great software and hardware engineers. But, I really didn't think a simple color laser printer could get much better. I was sooo wrong. This HP laser printer is fantastic ! So many great features that just work seamlessly. The web interface is simple and has everything you could possibly want to setup on a printer. The scanner works perfect ... every time. Scan to email or PC is soooo smooth. Great printer ! I would highly recommend it for home or office use.
customer_reviews.author: Don Y

customer_reviews.title: Worst consumer product I have purchased in the last year
customer_reviews.text: The software on this printer is absolute trash. It is confusing, complex, and makes it extremely difficult to accomplish anything. Basic functions that are available on low end printers (like print from Dropbox or scan to email) either don’t work or are incredibly complex to set up. The HP web sites for things like Instant Ink barely work. Scan quality and resolution is bad. I can’t believe this is a high end model because it is so bad at everything other than printing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of box.  Twice. HP quality a thing of the past.
customer_reviews.text: Bought once, did not work, returned again, same problem. Returned again. May have been a bad production run but HP seems to have terrible quality in the current product line. I keep wanting to use HP due to my decades of use of their formerly reliable printers but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Covey

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set up and does not perform as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a BAAS in Applied Technology and 20 years of experience setting up PCs, laptops, and printers. This has, by far, been the most difficult and non-user friendly machine I have ever experienced. I wish I had not bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer
customer_reviews.text: Heavy home use, very easy to set up and use. Go to HP for latest firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon L. Abdouch

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: My personal HP 4050TN printer is 20 years old and works FLAWLESSLY on a daily basis. Very cost effective. This NEW printer is without peer in many respects. One day old and we are in awe of its QUALITY. I am not a computer geek, but I know enough to report this printer as A+++. Purchase with confidence. It took me 6 months researching to decide and I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Benton Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental
customer_reviews.text: This has been the absolute worst HP experience ever. This machine is extremely temperamental. I've work with printers over 14 years and have never had problems like I have with HP printers. Paper jams constantly (annoyingly), phantom jams, mags. like "drawer 2 is over filled with paper, check paper and remove excess to below the line" (there was not a single piece of paper in the machine). This is my 4th and LAST HP printer. Such a shame...
customer_reviews.author: Duana

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE hate it
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap, with 450 dollar refills! Seriously? It doesn't even work well. Cartridges have issues too. Great. Now I'm stuck with it. Monstrosity.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sunther

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT PRINT 2 SIDED and very very slow to respond
customer_reviews.text: It's not printing two sided if you have to take what just printed and put it back in the paper tray! On what planet is that two sided? Also, this thing takes literally minutes instead of seconds to communicate with the computer. Locks up whatever app you are trying to print from. Total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hammond

customer_reviews.title: I'm worried
customer_reviews.text: Just got this HP Laserjet Pro MFP M479fdw set up and I'm worried that it will even last. Turned it on and it started screechhhhhhhing then just a dull wooshing sounds as one of the cheap plastic rollers is unhappy. This printer is replacing a 2004 Color laser printer that I NEVER had to service. Pros: Auto Duplexing, Low noise, Low Odor, Efficient Sleep/Wake Cycles, Nice printer screen interface. Cons: HP is putting computer chips in their overpriced toners now! That's complete consumer bull$h*t and shouldn't be allowed. Also problematic - Shipping was a week late, which while not tragic, was inconvenient because the old printer was already repurposed using the original shipping date.
customer_reviews.author: Howrd

customer_reviews.title: Has turned into a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Terrible printer. Printer comes off network easily and I've spent over an hour each time with tech support. Additionally you can only use HP toners which are VERY VERY EXPENSIVE. HP has installed microchips on their toners so if you try and use a non HP brand you have to remove the microchip to the new toner and it easily comes loose and then the printer won't print. This has turned into a nightmare. HP tried telling me that they don't force you to use HP toners but they highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my teleworking life; just wish it scanned to Apple computers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic printer for home office use while I'm teleworking. Easy to set up over WiFi. Only complaint is that the direct Scan to Computer from the Printer screen won't work with Mac computers; only Windows. It's a limitation that's regrettably buried in the user manual (which you can read online). Fatal flaw? No. Just more cumbersome. Printer cartridges that came with the printer were good: I got about 2500 pages about of them and while some still low, I'm still using all the originals except the black ink. Double sided printing is fast; double sided scanning is fast. Really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Damion

customer_reviews.title: Dont believe in the user manual.
customer_reviews.text: It didnt specify that it will only work for 110v, but in the manual its 110v or 220v. I plugged in to a 220v, the rest is history. HP support didnt cover the warranty, its just a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Angel C.

customer_reviews.title: has been a real pleasure - -
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a pretty high-end multi-function inkjet printer (a different brand). It was fine at first when we used it more often, but there always seemed to be an issue with one color or another when usage was less frequent (the ink dried out, I guess, and I needed to run the "clean and alignment" procedure almost every time we wanted to print). Such a pain... BUT with this new HP laser - it's perfect every time. Double sided copy is a real plus. It's always on - wakes from sleep mode when we need it, and sleeps at low power otherwise. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck P.

customer_reviews.title: May be returning soon if scan to email doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Scan to email feature does NOT work. Gives an error message during setup when testing the settings. "Error. Test failed due to a printer error. Try again after sometime." Been trying for 2 weeks now. Even at first the scan feature did not work. Finally was able to get the scan to computer to work but still can't get scan to email to work yet.
customer_reviews.author: JayhawkMAH

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This printer could be fantastic but anytime you dont use it for a few hours getting it to reconnect is a major challenge. I frequently have to uninstall and reinstall it on my computer to get it to work. I just want something that works, this is not it. And if you do choose to buy it, check the price of the replacement toner cartridges. Mine just got dumped in the garbage, I will not waste another single second of my life begging this POS to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-stop nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I have had to spend hours per day with HP support trying to get this printer to work. Almost every day, there's another issue where it doesn't receive print jobs from my computer. I have spent untold hours with HP tech support trying to get this printer to work. Now today, the HP support website doesn't recognize the serial number / claims it's out of warranty, and that I may have to PAY for tech support. I only bought the printer a few weeks ago. I LITERALLY CAN'T PRINT WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to replace a 6 yr old HP printer. This thing is crap compared to the old one. It doesn't copy as good, the menu is much harder to use. It will not make a black and white copy of something in color, so it wastes it's expensive color toner. I would much rather have my old machine back. I would never buy another one of these and it's probably going to keep me from buying HP in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Y

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems. It takes way to long from when you press print to when the pages actually print.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Holley

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, quick print & scan, VERY reliable
customer_reviews.text: It took less than 15 minutes to set up and I was quickly able to connect to the printer on my personal Macbook Pro, my work ThinkPad, and both mobile devices. Scanning is also very quick and can be accessible on the phone, laptop, or via a portable USB drive. I had a Canon ImageClass before this that I constantly had to fight with and this HP laserjet surpasses the Canon by leaps and bounds. This all-in-one printer is definitely worth the investment. The only con is that it's on the heavier side, so just be careful lifting it into place in your office.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst printer ever
customer_reviews.text: The worst printer I’ve ever used or bought. From day 1, it hasn’t been able to print from my computer, saying the printer isn’t connected- but it is and the status says the network connection is strong. Customer support is crap, the motherboard needed a replacement part and they sent out out the wrong part two times and it took the tech hours each time to figure that out. I bought the extended warranty but it is crap too. Next step is returning it and getting one that works with Mac, not just claims to. DON’T BUY THIS PRINTER
customer_reviews.author: Caryn h.

customer_reviews.title: This LaserJet has been far from the best HP LaserJet
customer_reviews.text: This LaserJet M479fdw has been far more trouble than my 4 year old M477fdw. The 477 worked completely and flawlessly from the first and continues to do so. This 479 constantly disconnects from the network. I have deleted and reloaded the drivers/software half a dozen times over the last 3 months. The software has all the current patches and the firmware has the latest flash. I would have returned the unit if I had purchased it from one of the warehouse clubs with their 90 day warranty but it was unavailable and I needed it right away. So I purchased from Amazon. What a freaking dud this model is!!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great performance; hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: They state it is easy to set up. It was harder than expected. There directions did not cover what I had to do to get it set up. I used my personal experience to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Print quality is not the best for color prints
customer_reviews.text: When printing in black this printer provided excellent results, but with colored prints the results were block and pixelated. This is common for laser printers when printing in color, however my previous laser printer of another brand did color prints that came close to inject quality. I bought this printer based on several reviews I saw at the time mentioning the great quality of the colored prints. Granted I have seen worse from cheaper laser printers, the color quality on this one was disappointing and definitely not a selling point for this model.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quality printer packed with new features
customer_reviews.text: The print quality and speed is amazing. Duplex scanning and printing are huge time savers. It also comes with good new features such as Wi-Fi and Goole Cloud supports. Only complaint is the OCR software included with the driver, which conflicts with Adobe Acrobat’s OCR. So I had to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Ps Z

customer_reviews.title: Great, Affordable, and Easy Set-Up
customer_reviews.text: Great printer so far! Set-up took about 30 minutes and was not hard at all. You go to HP’s website to install all needed drivers. This printer does it all and it also scans and faxes. Great price and huge bonus that it came with the black and color toner cartridges already installed.... those alone paid for the price of the printer! We have used HP printers for years and will continue to do so!! Looks nice in my daughter’s home office!
customer_reviews.author: Back to Nature and Books

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started my own company and was looking for a new printer that would be able to support the newfound quantity of paper I would be needing to print. I had my daughter do some research and this is the printer she stumbled on... Couldn’t be happier. It is a great size as is fits on my countertop and I have not had any issues so far. Easy installation (toner came preinstalled).
customer_reviews.author: Lori D

customer_reviews.title: Darn nice printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this HP printer to replace a brother multifunction printer so far Ive had this HP nearly 2 months and I am more than pleased with it it seem to set it self up almost automatically without me having to do hardly anyhting to get it to recognise my Wi-Fi system I was quite impressed period. I was very sceptical buying an HP printer as so many of their computer products are very junkie but this printer seems to be exactly the opposite it seems like an excellent printer I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pileits

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from a previous model M477 but will not use the same toner
customer_reviews.text: The earlier model M477 began failing after two years and I had several hundred dollars of toner so i tried to order the same model so i could use the old toner. But I got stuck with the old toner and a failing machine that lasted only a couple of years. They don't tell you that they are sending you a different machine when you try to order the old model. If this model is like the older version they don't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Borami Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: HP Rocks! Best small business printer even large company would work
customer_reviews.text: Sexy printer works like a charm! Easy to set up! Avoid setting up through the printer or computer I found the fastest and easiest way was through the mobile app! Download if you’ll save an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Love this line of HP MFP Devices
customer_reviews.text: I own an IT company and recommend these series to all of my clients! We need something that can scan to network folders on servers or computers reliably and I absolutely love that the scan to folder authentication setup can be tested from the web interface so you don't spend a bunch of your time and of your clients time back and forth on phone calls saying does it work now, how about now? You know it is going to work because there is a test button built into the setup of the new scan to method :) print quality is amazing, toner is expensive but all toner is. I purchase the high yield toner packages and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cost-Benefit ratio way too high
customer_reviews.text: I will not trust the good reviews from now on. Hard to be set up, the wireless connection is not working, with brand new color cartiges, printing in color doesn't work. I print just couple of pages a week. Now it's too late to return it. I'm not necesarily disapointed on the unrealistic price, but on its functionality. I have to google every setting I need to make, the manual is so unclear. The touch screen works with lots of lags. Please judge this comment as appropriate, please test the product while you're in the return window.
customer_reviews.author: cris_ami

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase! Quick to print, great print quality. Easy set up. I bought this because of certain features, 2-sided printing, prints on card stock and photo paper, and have been very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen has been nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen has been terrible. Have to touch screen every time you print. Tech support hung up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Shoup

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ugh it’s super moody.. It’s a really good day when it prints but when it doesn’t then you’re wasting hours trying to get it to print. Even though everything shows connected, the test page print perfectly but that’s it. Not worth the money and wasted so much of my time trying to figure out why it prints every other time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Duplex Print causes paper Jam, right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Brand New, just delivered. Print looks great, but every time a double sided print is requested the second page jams. There are many pages of suggestions on HP support, but so what. Its a brand new printer. It should work. It doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: SkyLimey

customer_reviews.title: Lurve my printer!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER fast, EASY to setup. I read reviews that claimed this printer was so hard to setup. You have to be really stupid to make this printer hard to setup. It's almost just turn it on and use it... it's that simple!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I haven't run the new machine through all its paces yet, but so far I'm delighted with it. It's so fast and quiet, the color quality is good as far as I can see (I haven't printed a lot of photos yet, but plenty of graphics), and it accepts 80# card stock with ease. (I haven't tried anything heavier than that yet.) Just the other day, I tried the document feeder--a feature my last copier didn't have--to do two-sided to two-sided printing of a large document. Wow! What a time-saver!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Stern

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Laser Printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer came on time. It fit perfectly in my office. The setup of the printer was easy and straight forward. I was able to hook the printer into my network so that it is available to all my computers in my home and office. The printer is fast and has a lot of options that I still am going through to utilize.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Watch when ordering! Had features disabled in the firmware! Had to hire a computer repair shop to come in and fix! Ended up way more expensive than ordering from Office Depot or staples for same product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby T.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Document Feeder
customer_reviews.text: I use this printer daily in my office. It is a bit noisier than my last printer. The print quality is good; the scanner is itself is serviceable. However, the document feeder consistently feeds through multiple pages stuck together. I have to run the documents through multiple times and often have to run a few pages at a time before I can scan an entire document. This happens more often than not. It is not a problem with the document pages ... it is clearly the feeder. I have run the same documents through my home printer/scanner (a Brother product) with no problems; then this scanner and the pages run through at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Best Printer for the money
customer_reviews.text: This printer was bought to replace an old network printer that was not compatible with modern devices and had stopped working anyway. This printer was set up in about an hour or so to all my devices. PC's & iPhones and iPads. Perfectly seamless operation and the print quality is outstanding. The multi-page scanning into the the Hp software or other acquisition software is perfect. Scan to Email is a great feature too. Five Stars and no regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ouderkirk

customer_reviews.title: This was not a new printer
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box and it seems to work fine, but there was almost no protective packaging in the box and the box was clearly re-taped up. The ink cartridges also showed about 500 pages of use when I printed the report. Not thrilled with any of this but there is no damage visible on the unit so I will live with it. Not what I would expect from Amazon who is usually great. It can be returned thru the end of the year so I have some time to see if this unit is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was the easiest of any printer I've ever used. Connected it to the router via Ethernet CAT5 and it was detected immediately. The HP software downloaded from the suggested site without any issues. Scanning is very intuitive. So far, I've been able to operate this printer without having to look anything up. The scanning software is very clear, easy to understand and works every time. I had a Brother printer before this and it was nothing but trouble. This HP is a breath of fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Superb MFD.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! The first page comes out super fast and the quality is great. The built in duplex feature is fantastic. This machine replaced an older version I had for several years. HP didn’t disappoint. The ability to email a document to the printer and it prints automatically while I’m not home is helpful. Has a feature for copying, where you can select ID card or document. So it automatically moves the image if doing an ID. No issues so far, but except replacement toner is a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Damaged package
customer_reviews.text: When a package especially electronics arrives like this damaged, best thing to do is return it before opening.
customer_reviews.author: M. STEWART

customer_reviews.title: very nice printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small business its fast and reliable and takes up less space than expected. I only wish that the drawer that holds 10x14" paper could close completely,
customer_reviews.author: gkhaze

customer_reviews.title: Printer Jams nearly every time it prints
customer_reviews.text: After about a month this printer started jamming with nearly each page it attempts to print. Of course Amazon won't replace this unit with a functioning one or a different model nor will they provide me a refund. Instead I have to deal with HP support.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Been Good To Me So Far
customer_reviews.text: Owned for several months now and very happy with this printer. Print quality is good. Extended features are easy to set up and use. Wireless printing worked right out of the box, didn’t even have to set anything up. Very nice to be able to print from our smart phones. Quiet and fast. Jury is still out on longevity. Got a second job and saving money to pay for the next set of toner cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: ckm

customer_reviews.title: Broken and On Site Warranty not honored
customer_reviews.text: This was the replacement for the first M479fdw I just ordered from Amazon. Second unit also could not scan papers. Still indicates it scanned successfully but never moved the paper nor are the rollers even turning to move the papers. Again - zero of next business day on site support that is advertized with this product - so totally false advertising. Sorry to say but HP is junk. Save the hassle and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: michael j.

customer_reviews.title: Good MF printer, but sloooww!
customer_reviews.text: I have an HP Jet Pro M452 which I love and have had for about 3 years. It is a great printer and is fast. I bought this MFP M479fdw as a second printer for multiple purposes. It does a good job but it take 2-3 times longer to receive a computer command than my other printer. I'm impatient I suppose but after having one that is so quick, it frustrates me to sit there waiting for the 479 to process the command.
customer_reviews.author: Dale K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing multifunction LaserJet
customer_reviews.text: This printer is fantastic. I don’t have to print a lot, but when I do I need the printer to work. I use the scanner and fax portion of this a lot and they work great. I’d been through so many multifunction ink jet printers where the ink would just dry up and ruin the heads because I print so infrequently. This is a little bulky, but well worth it for the features and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Most likely will return for a full refund
customer_reviews.text: 1. It's huge and takes up a lot of space 2. Difficult set up - I can't set up the scan functionality 3. Impossible to reach Customer Support 4. Very expensive especially considering the many issues VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Juliette A. Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer. Using for home use - but tired of replacing ink so often. Read that if you don't use ink often in the inkjet they dry out and you have to purchase more ink despite low use. This uses toner and lasts longer! This is so fast, quiet, and vibrant! Print quality is exceptional, can print from iPhone.... We love it!
customer_reviews.author: JAro

customer_reviews.title: Nice Printer/scanner
customer_reviews.text: Set up was very easy. No problems with connecting it on my network or wirelessly to my phone. Scanning is fairly easy with their software.
customer_reviews.author: Genes

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the printer for the school works. I should have bought this long time ago. I am glad to buy this printer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: OK printer
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful printer. Most color prints look nice. But I am not a fan of it because when I first printed a photo on A4 size smooth paper, the print was horrible. Color patches all over it. Only 6th print came well. It can’t print small size “thank you cards.” It gets stuck at every card. Slow printing of envelopes....
customer_reviews.author: Manohar James

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Document Feeder - DOES NOT WORK RIGHT. TILT SCAN, PAGE CUT OFF and MISSING PAGES
customer_reviews.text: I like HP printers but this printer was a huge disappointment for me. Just like most of the reviews. The ADF really suck which was the main reason I bought it for. Crumble the paper, scan job is tilted and cut off pages. Do not get this printer if you use the ADF alot. I went with the Brother MFC-L3770CDW after reading the reviews and WOW I am so happy with it. It just simply work and it is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kao Vang

customer_reviews.title: Color Test No All Prints
customer_reviews.text: Connected the printer and did a 'print test'. Print was perfect, blue HP logo was perfect. Now every single page, even form a test print on the printer directly, has the Blue, Magenta, Yellow stripes across the page.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Pippett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend buying from Hp pros! Great product and packaged very well. Came as described if not better. I will be looking to do business with them again.
customer_reviews.author: UltimateReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Feature rich but rarely works.
customer_reviews.text: Within the first month it only worked sporadically for some users, and did not print at all for others. It may be a reasonably affordable purchase price for a small office printer, but the real cost will be time spent trying to figure out why it isn't working, uninstalling/reinstalling drivers/software, and listening to your coworkers tell you what a stupid printer you bought. Save your time and money - buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Giering

customer_reviews.title: HP Color LaserJet Pro Multifunction M479fdw Wireless Laser Printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer, I hope that you will support it for many years to come..... P.S. Next time produce these printers in BLACK.......
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra Ca$h for nice orinter
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it Tired of low budget printers This is probably overkill for home office but works well Very fast, fairly quiet and “plays well” with Macs (which Brother does not) Tech support could be better, but once the app is installed etc it works
customer_reviews.author: RM98104

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to figure out how to scan
customer_reviews.text: I can make it scan from my computer but not the button on the machine. Super frustrating. Can't find a phone number to call HP for help.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Burzynski

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth the price, so far.
customer_reviews.text: I love the clear, crisp print. Color print is great. Prints fast. Quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: It's a great printer with all the ins and out we look for in an all in one printer. I have it a 2 overall rating only because when you have to replace the toner it will cost you 3 times the cost of the what you paid for the printer. Printer is great, its a work horse but toner is way to expensive. I have mixed feelings and recommendation on this one, if you print a lot of color the cost of toner may be way to expensive
customer_reviews.author: Roberto O.

customer_reviews.title: Red Streaks on Every Page
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, after setting it up, the printer is applying red streaks on every page. Contacted HP customer support and was not helpful. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this August 2019 and in June 2020 I keep having issues. Cartridge issues (all toner is bought from HP direct), constantly looses scanning and printing connections - although it is hardwired to the office.
customer_reviews.author: Basem Toma

customer_reviews.title: Works when it works... HP quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: When the lcd went out Amazon sent another it lasted only a few months... cheep plastic
customer_reviews.author: Ari Balkin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible driver for Win 10
customer_reviews.text: The worst HP printer I ever have. Losing the WiFi connection, the WiFi card. After sleep mode always required power off/on cycle. Sometime driver reinstall is required otherwise the printer shows as offline. Tested with MS Surface pro and diverse mobile Dell workstation models.
customer_reviews.author: AlexRW

customer_reviews.title: pretty good printer
customer_reviews.text: the color laser does very decent job of rendering colors; software makes scans pretty easy, wireless setup was a snap. My monthly duty cycle is around 500 pages, so can't yet judge if stated cartridge life is as advertised. For home office, this is very nice printer.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Edelman

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up and get working
customer_reviews.text: Im not all that technical, and was dreading setting this up, but it went as planned. Ive printed and scanned wirelessly! The product arrived on time, and was just as advertise, all ready to go !
customer_reviews.author: P. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: HP Color LaserJet Pro Multifunction M479fdw
customer_reviews.text: Best printer I ever owned and used, easy to set up, superb print quality. What surprised me that it only takes 1 second to print from my smart phone, compared to my old brother printer took minutes to printer if I was lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Henry's dad

customer_reviews.title: awful quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience. Would print 2-3 pages and then pause for "print head cleaning" and then a misprint error follows requiring a reset. Then it prints 2-3 pages and the cycle repeats. Neither our IT dept or and outside printer services company could fix the problem. Just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I searched quite a while before placing order and I'm not regret at all. My main purpose is to print textbooks for kids online class but to my great surprise, very high quality shows up for photo printing. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Can't copy legal docs or shrink them to letter size
customer_reviews.text: #1 Amazon left the box outside behind the tile board at my office , saying it's in a secure location , not really when it is visible from the street . #2 When I ordered this printer it says that you can do legal paper , I can not fit legal on the glass deck to shrink it to letter size . I am less than impressed and rather upset that we wasted this amount of money when my old copier ( HP ) had a legal sized deck . Was expecting an upgrade not a step down . Busy office no time to fuss with folding paper to make it fit .
customer_reviews.author: Lorie E. Gouge

customer_reviews.title: Decent printer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job printing copying and scanning. Only thing I dont like is you need to wake it everytime you want to do something and its always asking me to load paper even though the bin is full. All ot does is slow down the print job. It's a decent not great printer.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdog782

customer_reviews.title: Ink Cartridges
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike about the product is the ink. The have chips in them and when I replace the ink, it does read the chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting any help
customer_reviews.text: All of the guides on the HP website are outdated and don't apply to the current software, good luck figuring anything out if you run into trouble.
customer_reviews.author: rootbeerafloat

customer_reviews.title: Not so grand
customer_reviews.text: For some strange reason the printer WILL NOT recognize 2.4 band wifi or USB direct connection. Only alternative was to "enroll" online through web services and make it a network printer. For all this money it should fry ham and eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Rebelbw

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Replace an HP Laserjet 6P after 25 years of use. All functions are working like a champ so far! Dreading having to spend money on color toner but very happy with purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: MattyK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy HP printers if you want to print
customer_reviews.text: Printer keeps losing the network. Must turn off and restart printer to use it on the network. This is an HP problem. Don’t buy this printer if you want to air print.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy-to-use, no-surprises copier
customer_reviews.text: This printer is fast and reliable. It is easy to set up. It has all the right features that I was looking for in a laser printer...it is fast, easy to use, prints crisp copies, easy-to-use scanner, wi-fi, color, double-sided printing, feeder tray and document surface copies. I'm using it at home while working during the pandemic, but it is ideal for our small ministry office. The price seems reasonable. It isn't a monstrosity; fits nicely on an end table next to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great printer but setup requires a degree.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was not as plug and play as I’d like. Four months in and I’m still trying to figure out scanning to email or even scanning to PC. I like the speed of startup and printing and quality in color is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Liquidmachine

customer_reviews.title: the feeder for the scanner can't feed itself one page at a time
customer_reviews.text: it feeds several pages at a time so scanning does not work properly, I'll return it.
customer_reviews.author: Los Coyotes Pet Hospital

customer_reviews.title: Printer Cartridges
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer because I needed a cost-effective high quality laser color printer. However, the replacement cartridges cost $500! Moe than the printer. I tried using a low-cost generic but discovered I hd to manually remove the printer cartridge memory chip and replace it in the new cartridge. I tried doing this and the chip fell into the new cartridge and got stuck! Now I can't afford the cartridges with the chip and I have no working cartridges so I have a useless $400 printer! I will never buy HP again!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice P.

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen likes to freeze
customer_reviews.text: Machine is pretty high tech. Sometimes smarter than me. The copies are amazing, always come out clear and nice. Touchscreen has froze up on me multiple times though. Each time I've had to turn the machine off for a few minutes and reboot. The Toners for this are extremely expensive and for a business that makes tons of copies each day, its almost not worth the price on how fast we go through them. Buying generic toner is a pain because you have to remove the chip from the old toner and replace. I probably would not buy this machine again for business. Buying it for home use should be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwood Oaks Health Center

customer_reviews.title: Impressive printer. Excellent for small business needs.
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this printer. We are a small business office of 3-5 employees that needs high quality color prints for regular meetings. I have spent far too much money replacing ink jet cartridges over the past years for our office inkjet printer to produce poor quality, striped bland photos. I decided to give this laser printer a try and the clarity, speed and quality is fantastic. My only regret is that I did not purchase this sooner. It meets all of our needs. 5 STARS.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Buy now
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh.... I don't care what anyone else says. The easiest set up ever. And I am impressed overall with my purchase, product, and services. This is highly recommended. First purchase for side business at home. Cheers all and stay safe!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Smith

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Difficult set up, kept going off line, scanning feature does not work from the printer, only scan from the computer. Color is great, printing is good Alot of money for the issues with scanning, and we scan alot
customer_reviews.author: Domna G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I work from home and print ALOT. Prints, scans, copies lightning fast!
customer_reviews.author: Callie Martin

customer_reviews.title: great for school
customer_reviews.text: Overkill for a home PC but very fast and wireless for my Android device secure and can print 2000 pages on standard capacity toner cartridges which means I can print like a madman and never run out of toner anytime soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids who work out of the home some of the time and they just love it. Great for the kids school work and even the grandpa (me) can print easily right from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Un-Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than ink jet for home.
customer_reviews.text: After more than 6 ink jet printers purchases, we finally made the switch to a laser jet. This printer is amazing. May seem like too much for just home use but we were tired of buying ink and printing errors with the ink jets.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Power On Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a problematic product to some. I've used it's sister product (MFP 428 few) at work with no issues. This unit did not work when we opened it up at Christmas. Amazon is sending a replace that will get here in three days. I will update when that unit arrives. after reading reviews it seems that some others have had issues with this unit out of the box. I'm skeptical at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Green

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Mac do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: HP will tell you that this product has known issues with the Mac OS.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: High Qulity. Easy to use. Many new functions.
customer_reviews.text: I've had many HP Printers. Clearly this new model is more multi-function that is automatic. So far have not had any jams or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great Lase Printer
customer_reviews.text: Installed itself in Windows 10, was printing five minutes later. Excellent copy, excellent operation.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Best laser printer...
customer_reviews.text: Best laser printer put their but on the expensive side. Comes with great features like mobile printing etc.
customer_reviews.author: Salman Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Easy to set up. Compact enough. Holds a ton of paper. Print quality is excellent for my reports that I have to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ann Emerson

product_meta.title: HP Color LaserJet Pro Multifunction M479fdw Wireless Laser Printer with One-Year, Next-Business Day, Onsite Warranty, Works with Alexa (W1A80A)
product_meta.description: Model:M479fdw| Style:PrinterIt's built to keep your business moving forward—the HP color LaserJet Pro MFP M479fdw keeps up with how you actually work, collaborate, and get things done. With fast print, scan, copy, and fax capabilities, best-in-class security, and automated workflows, This multifunction color laser printer is designed to let you focus your time on growing your business and staying ahead of the competition. Maximize productivity with an intuitive 4. 3" Color touchscreen control panel, and stay connected with easy mobile printing options. This wireless color laser printer is also designed with the environment in mind; save up to 18% energy over prior products without compromising productivity, and help save paper right out of the box with the default paper savings mode. Compatible operating systems-Windows Client OS (32/64 bit), Win10, Win8.1, Win 8 Basic, Win8 Pro, Win8 Enterprise, Win8 Enterprise N, Win7 Starter Edition SP1, UPD Win7 Ultimate, Mobile OS, iOS, Android, Mac, Apple macOS Sierra v10.12, Apple macOS High Sierra v10.13, Apple macOS Mojave v10.14, Discrete PCL6 Printer Driver
feature_bullets: BUILT TO KEEP YOUR BUSINESS MOVING FORWARD Print, scan, copy and fax consistently high quality documents with the HP Color LaserJet Pro Multifunction M479fdw, a wireless printer designed to let you focus on growing your business

BEST-IN-CLASS SECURITY A suite of embedded security features, like instant threat notifications and optional PIN/Pull printing, help protect your color laser printer from being an entry point for attacks and help ensure the safety of your sensitive data

AUTOMATE COMPLICATED WORKFLOWS Help save time by automating all the steps in a complicated workflow, and apply your saved settings at a touch of a button via the customizable touchscreen control panel. Dimensions Maximum (W X D X H)- 15.7 x 18.6 x 16.4 inches
PRINT WITH OR WITHOUT A NETWORK Use built in Wi Fi Direct to connect your smartphone directly to your wireless laser printer for easy mobile printing, even without a local network connection
SPEED THROUGH TASKS Stay productive with single pass, 2 sided scanning, 50 sheet auto document feeder, 250 sheet input tray, and print speeds of up to 28 pages per minute from this laser printer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars917 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
